https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2Iudimnh0S1pd56ZTDyvWp5YTFz.jpg A married couple of 6 years invites an old friend and his new, free spirited girlfriend to their Hamptons Summer home for a long weekend. Emotions and desires are stirred but in ways none of them expected. 4 Nights in the Hamptons
